name: Sexy Egress Backpacked X-ray
description:
CONTROLS:  
Use mouse, play until the credits roll. (If mouse scroll is too uncomfortable for you, you can also use L, but this is not recommended)

CREDITS: 
See ingame, but special thanks to krisekrise and jucaxcutie. And thanks to everyone from this year's klikmas event!

Made for Stranger from the Glorious Trainwrecks community. 
Their original prompt:
For Klikmas this year I would like a game involving a highly detailed interactive backpack. That's all I want, but I'll add some of my thoughts below. -> https://www.glorioustrainwrecks.com/node/11726#comment-31700
